meta.title: Cristina Tuazon | Senior Software Engineer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing software engineering expertise and innovative projects

about.bio: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and AI-powered solutions. Passionate about clean code, system architecture, and mentoring the next generation of developers.
focus: Leading technical teams and implementing best practices

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead the development of cloud-native applications and AI-powered solutions. Architect scalable systems handling millions of users while maintaining 99.9% uptime. Mentor junior developers and drive technical excellence across teams.
achievements: Built microservices architecture that improved system performance by 45%
Led the development of AI chatbot platform serving 100k+ daily users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed end-to-end web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated with product teams to deliver user-centric features and implemented robust testing strategies.
achievements: Built React-based dashboard increasing user engagement by 60%
Optimized database queries reducing API response times by 40%
Mentored 3 junior developers and established code review processes

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a SaaS platform from MVP to 10,000+ users. Implemented features across the full stack and participated in architectural decisions for scaling.
achievements: Developed RESTful APIs serving 1M+ requests daily
Implemented real-time features using WebSocket technology
Created automated testing suite improving code reliability by 50%

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
